name: cson2json
description: A super-lightweight library for converting CSON objects to JSON objects.

scripts.parser:esm: sed -i -e 's/module.exports/export const CSON/' src/parser/cson.js && rm src/parser/cson.js-e
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run parser && npm run parser:esm && npm run compile && npm run test
